channel.title: IntelliBitz Technologies- OpenSource Freedom
channel.description:
Opensource software has caught the attention of the consulting industry as a quality alternative for their software needs.
Our focus on providing Quality opensource software solutions for a variety of domains. We believe in highly trained people who can deliver what the business requires at the right time.

item.title: IntelliGeek-Learning Made Fun
item.description: IntelliGeek is the place for both learning and edu-tainment
